choose.when: select no, title, (select name from user where no = a.user_no) as userName, hit, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate, user_no, depth from board a where title like CONCAT('%',${keyword },'%') order by g_no desc, o_no asc LIMIT ${page }, 5
choose.otherwise: select no, title, (select name from user where no = a.user_no) as userName, hit, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate, user_no, depth from board a order by g_no desc, o_no asc LIMIT ${page }, 5
select count(*) from board where title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
